name: Responsive CSS Global
format:
<style>
  * { box-sizing: border-box; }
  html, body, md-content, .nr-dashboard-dashboard { overflow-x: hidden; }
  .nr-dashboard-cardcontainer { padding: 4px; }
  md-card { width: 100%; max-width: calc(100% - 8px); }

  .mobile-only { display: none !important; }
  .desktop-only { display: block !important; }

  @media (max-width: 600px) {
    .desktop-only { display: none !important; }
    .mobile-only { display: block !important; }
    md-card { margin: 2px !important; }
    .nr-dashboard-cardcontainer { padding: 2px !important; }
  }

  /* QR cards */
  .qr-card {
    background: #ffffff;
    padding: 16px 18px;
    border-radius: 12px;
    box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.18);
    text-align: center;
    width: 100%;
  }
  .qr-title {
    font-weight: 700;
    margin-bottom: 8px;
    color: #111111;
  }
  .qr-card img {
    width: 200px;
    height: 200px;
    display: block;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }
  .qr-hint {
    margin-top: 8px;
    font-size: 13px;
    color: #333333;
  }
  @media (max-width: 600px) {
    .qr-card { padding: 12px 14px; }
    .qr-card img { width: 170px; height: 170px; }
    .qr-hint { font-size: 12px; }
  }

</style>
